phaseBar.feedback: This is a new service – your feedback will help us to improve it.

webform.title: Send us a message
webform.desc: You’ll get a response by email within 2 working days.
webform.link: Send message (opens in a new window)

webchat.title: Web chat
webchat.desc: Get some help by messaging an agent online.
webchat.textChatDown: Web chat is currently unavailable.\nPlease try again later or call us on the number below if your enquiry is urgent.
webchat.textChatWithAnAgent: Start web chat (opens in a new window)
webchat.textNoAgentsAvailable: No agents are available, please try again later.
webchat.textAllAgentsBusy: All our web chat agents are busy helping other people.\nPlease try again later or contact us using one of the ways below.
webchat.textChatClosed: Web chat is now closed.\n Come back Monday to Friday 8:30am to 5pm. Or contact us using one of the ways below.
webchat.textChatAlreadyOpen: A web chat window is already open.

telephone.title: Telephone
telephone.desc: Talk to one of our agents now over the phone.

en.cookieText: GOV.UK uses cookies to make the site simpler. Find out more about cookies
en.emailIfProblems: Send us a message
en.responseTime: We aim to get back to you within 5 days
